title: D5 Tx Fee Refund Program
body:
Aragon interactions are expensive. 
https://client.aragon.org/#/d5dao/

We've avoided interacting with the DAO contracts several times due to high gas  prices and also high transaction costs. 

This proposal aims to refund DAO members for their interactions with the DAO. 

Some basic analysis on interaction costs are available here: 

https://github.com/d5-ai/aragon_d5_gas_anayltics/blob/master/aragon_d5_gas_analytics/analytics.ipynb

In order to make this simple, we will allow D5 Members to claim back ether as soon as they spend a certain threshold in eth fees. (This could be about 0.2 - 0.5 eth to make things simple) . 

If this proposal passes, we can vote for that next :)
author: 0x6DEebc6DeD7E4c8Ed2B7A5d958BE58fe29c6123C
